Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot/The Oblitercons:




Dark One, with an energon torch, had just finished the last piece of the 
smashed door.  He hadn't gotten enough satisfaction of killing that peace 
loving freak of a Predacon to be doing this, not nearly enough.  It also 
seemed that Nemesis Enforcer was on a power trip.

"Are we done?" Scavenger asked.

"I think so." Hiss replied to his comrade.

"Yes, we are done.  The repairs have been complete.  Let's go see our 
current...leader...about new orders, if any." Dark One, Breakdown, Pyro, 
Hiss, and Scavenger walked off for the bridge.

---

The Oblitercons were stopped by Scattershot, who was standing, arms crossed, 
in front of the door to the bridge.

"Halt!" he yelled with a demented smile.  "Who goes there?"

"Out of the way, we're going to see Nemesis." Dark One replied in an annoyed 
tone, pushing the underling out of the way.

"That's Emperor Nemesis Enforcer to you!" Scattershot yelled.

Dark One sighed.  Why him?  All he wanted to do was work as a mercenary for a 
competent leader.  Not a bunch of psychotic killers.  The door opened, all 
the mercenaries stepping through, not a single light in the bridge.

"Welcome." Nemesis Enforcer's voice seemed to boom.

"What the?"

"Silence.  The repairs are finished.  I have made schematics for you, plans 
you will begin after a night on a recharge bed."

"You're using the intercom to make your voice seem more powerful?" Hiss 
asked, looking around.

A light suddenly made on, Nemesis Enforcer on a black hover chair, five feet 
off the ground.  "Wonderful, isn't it!?"

All the Oblitercons sighed, each talking to each other about how crazy 
Nemesis and Scattershot were, leaving the room, Scattershot entering.

"Emperor, they should be punished for their infidelity!"

"Yes, General.  They should.  But there is no time for that, there are WORLDS 
to conquer!"
